main event: A visual sighting of an unidentified object was reported near Wright-Patterson Air Force Base on 8 March 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as large and gaining altitude while traveling towards the northeast,The sighting lasted for approximately one minute before the object disappeared,Weather conditions during the sighting were clear,Multiple investigations suggested that the reports may have been due to ice-crystal clouds and planetary reflections,One witness described a significant conflict in sound reports: while some heard noise, others did not.
witness description: air traffic controllers and military personnel
